verses.name: Matthew 18:10
verses.text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones; for I say unto you, That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 18:11
verses.text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost.

verses.name: Matthew 18:12
verses.text: How think ye? if a man have an hundred sheep, and one of them be gone astray, doth he not leave the ninety and nine, and goeth into the mountains, and seeketh that which is gone astray?
